# Eyes of Charming
## Overview
**Aura** moderate enchantment; **CL** 7th

**Slot** eyes

**Price** 56,000 gp for a pair

**Weight** —

**Description**

These two crystal lenses fit over the user’s eyes. The wearer is able to use *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]* (one target per round) merely by meeting a target’s gaze. Those failing a DC 16 Will save are charmed as per the spell. Both lenses must be worn for the magic item to take effect.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Heighten Spell (Feat)|Heighten Spell]], *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]*

**Cost** 28,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 512
